doc.title: Forever Yours
doc.plot: The spirit of a WWII soldier searches for his girl through the cavernous halls of New York's legendary old Pennsylvania Station. "Forever Yours" features a detailed 3D model of the long-gone station and includes live actors composited into this CG environment. The forlorn and melancholy tone to this piece is intended to be sympathetic to the emotion of loss engendered by the destruction of this legendary wonder.
